name: Dr. Marcus Greene
title: Founder & CEO
description: Holding a Ph.D. in Environmental Science from Stanford, Dr. Greene has always been a passionate advocate for eco-conscious innovations. His visionary leadership is the bedrock on which NaturaTech stands.

name: Aisha Kwon
title: CTO
description: Aisha, with her background in bio-engineering, is the mastermind behind the cutting-edge technologies at NaturaTech. She believes in harnessing nature's wisdom to address modern challenges.

name: Carlos Mendoza
title: Chief of Design
description: Carlos, an alumnus of Design Academy Eindhoven, combines minimalism with bio-inspired designs, making NaturaTech's products not only functional but also aesthetically appealing.

name: Lydia D'souza
title: VP of Operations
description: Lydia's expertise lies in sustainable supply chains. She ensures that every step in NaturaTech's operations is ethical, green, and efficient.

name: Jamal Ahmed
title: Head of EcoLearn Hub
description: Jamal, a former environmental studies professor from Yale, curates and oversees the rich tapestry of courses offered by EcoLearn, spreading eco-awareness across the globe.
